localizedMeta.description:
THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Androidâ„¢ DEVICES.

Fight your way through 50 levels and dozens of enemies who are trying to stop you from mining. Luckily you brought your secret weapon, dynamite! Get ready to explore many different mines ranging from maze-like labyrinths to enemy infested free for all. Along the way you will unlock some secret characters. Are you a bad enough dude, or dudette, to make it to the end?

Package size: 7684 KB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)
